data.title: Class of 2020
data.text:
Maggie has attended many dance competitions such as Youth American Grand Prix for several years, placing top 12 and 24, and The World Ballet Competition, placing top 24. She has also completed many levels of The Royal Academy of Dance exams, from grade 4-Intermediate Advanced. Academically, she has attended the National History Day finals at the University of Maryland, with partner Hannah Pancoast.

ACCEPTANCES WITH SCHOLARSHIPS

- Artistic Scholarship: AMDA College of the Performing Arts, Coker College, La Roche University, Radford University, Studio School, University of South Carolina, Winthrop University

- Academic Scholarship: University of South Carolina, Winthrop University

OTHER ACCEPTANCES

Coastal Carolina University, College of Charleston, Cornish College of the Arts, Dean College, Florida Southern University, Jacksonville University, Long Island University, Nazareth College, Peridance, Rutgers University, Southern Illinois University, Studio School, Temple University, University of North Carolina School of the Arts, University of South Carolina-Aiken, University of South Florida in Tampa
